title: Video: Earl Sweatshirt – Chum
body:
**Earl Sweatshirt**’s ‘_Chum_’ has been out for a while, now finally we can watch the video for the striking debut track from his upcoming album, due out on **Columbia Records**.

It’s as dense as the track, a long drawn out walk of loneliness with piercing high-contrast footage that fits the track almost perfectly.

It’s as dense as the track, a long drawn out walk of loneliness with piercing high-contrast footage that fits the track almost perfectly.
